name: deBridge
highlight: deBridge is a generic messaging and cross-chain interoperability protocol that enables decentralized transfers of arbitrary data and assets between various blockchains.
summary: deBridge is a generic messaging protocol and decentralized infrastructure that enables any arbitrary cross-chain interactions in a single transaction. Due to the ability to simultaneously send arbitrary assets and data, deBridge acts as a unified framework for all cross-chain needs and is capable of interconnecting any smart contract on any blockchain.
